name: Creative Media
description:
Creative Media began in 2000 with no clients and one aim: to do things differently, and put innovative thinking at the heart of what we do.
As a result of our expertise, we are able to offer a design service involving all elements of the industry. We can also provide added-value benefits, such as Web-design, Advertising, Signage, Digital Marketing, Copywriting and Art Direction, as well as our staple offering of design production for print.
